name: Brimstone
tagline: Web app for keeping track of stats in a board game
body:
##Welcome to Brimstone  

We are creating an app to help manage the board game ""Shadows of BrimStone" and all of its add-ons. 

This app will compile to iOS/android and web we plan to release each one. 

it will start with local only accounts and could grow depending on our time we can dedicate to it.

let us know if you like this game and want to help :)

- Spencer & Trent
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
